main event: A witness observed a bright orange object in the sky for about 40 minutes, initially mistaking it for a star.
interesting points: The object was very bright and orange in color,It did not disappear but was visible the entire observation time,The object was identified as possibly being Venus,The sighting lasted for approximately 40 minutes,There were multiple reports of UFOs from different witnesses in Dayton, Ohio.
sighted object: a bright orange object in the sky
witness description: Civilians who observed the object and reported it to the Air Force
